volop.name: Food Rescuer - Pompton Plains/Morris County to Paterson/Passaic County, NJ
volop.description:
Our volunteers recover healthy meals from commercial donor cafeterias and deliver them to specified nearby non-profit organizations. Every meal saved stays out of the landfill, helping the environment, while also nourishing our community in need. The volunteer role would involve:- Picking up meals from our donor cafeteria, and- Delivering these meals to our non-profit community partner in the nearby area.

We are looking for volunteers in Morris and Passaic County, able to rescue food from Atlantic Health Care, Pompton Plains and deliver it to Paterson, New Jersey.

The current need is for volunteers available on Monday and Thursday afternoons at 1:00 p.m.

Each volunteer task will take approximately one hour including travel time between donor and recipient.

We require volunteers to drive their own car. We welcome regular participation but will work with your schedule. Insulated bags will be provided to carry food donations.

address.full: 120 John Street, PRINCETON, New Jersey, US

volop.commitmentDetails: Volunteer jobs usually take about 60 minutes but can be less depending on the assignment. We welcome regular participation but will work with your schedule.
volop.otherRequirements: Volunteers will need access to a car, a valid driver's license and adequate auto insurance. They will also need a smartphone and be comfortable lifting and carrying large bags containing several meal trays.
